nodes.text: Comic strips are comics, presented in a series of strips.

A number of Star Wars comics strips were first published in newspapers by the Los Angeles Times Syndicate starting in 1979. Dark Horse Comics edited, colored, and reprinted most of these stories in comic-book form decades later.
Starting in 2004, all-new comic strips known as "webstrips" were published on StarWars.com's Hyperspace, alongside reprints of most of the original strips from the 1970s and 1980s.

In honor of the 30th anniversary of the Star Wars newspaper strips, a blog was started on blogspot.com in 2009 that posted a newspaper comic a day on roughly the same month and date of its original release.
